product_name: Lantern Press Grand Canyon National Park Mather Canyon Art Print - 12" x 18"
long_description: You'll feel inspired every day when you admire the Grand Canyon National Park Mather Canyon Art Print on your wall. Printed on recycled paper measuring 12 in. x 18 in. The Grand Canyon National Park Mather Canyon Art Print poster is packaged in a clear polyethylene sleeve with a back board. Lantern Press is a Seattle-based company that creates original, full-color, retro-style illustrated artwork. All Lantern Press products are printed in the U.S.A., on recycled paper whenever possible.
short_description: You'll feel inspired every day when you admire the Grand Canyon National Park Mather Canyon Art Print on your wall.
